                right: New {
                    target: AnonymousClass(

                            start: (
                                3,

                            ),
                            end: (
                                7,
                                1,
                            ),
                            extends: None,
                            implements: None,
                            attributes: [],

                                Method(
                                    Method {
                                        start: (
                                            4,
                                            12,
                                        ),
                                        end: (
                                            6,
                                            5,
                                        ),
                                        name: SimpleIdentifier {
                                            span: (
                                                4,

                                            ),
                                            name: "bar",
                                        },
                                        attributes: [],
                                        parameters: MethodParameterList {
                                            start: (
                                                4,

                                            ),
                                            end: (
                                                4,
                                                26,
                                            ),
                                            members: [],
                                        },
                                        body: Some(
                                            [
                                                Expression {
                                                    expr: Exit {
                                                        value: Some(

                                                                span: (
                                                                    5,
                                                                    14,
                                                                ),
                                                                value: "1",
                                                            },
                                                        ),
                                                    },
                                                },
                                            ],
